title.value: Совершенствование анализа инвестиционных расходов и оценки их эффективности на сельскохозяйственном предприятии
Perfection of the investment charges analysis and its efficiency estimations at an agricultural enterprise
Perfection of the investment charges analysis and its efficiency estimations at an agricultural enterprise

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Pasevich, I.T., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was analysed and evaluated the problem of investment expenses and their effectiveness is considered. Authors have revealed and explained the necessity of easy investment analysis methodology that could give an opportunity to predict the future economic benefits and make an assessment of their influence on the financial status of an agricultural company. The new technique of the operative analysis of investment charges and estimations of its efficiency assumes carrying out of the analysis on following three basic stages: the analysis of dynamics and structure of investment charges at the enterprise (allows to study structural changes of investment charges during of some years); the analysis of efficiency of investment charges (allows to estimate influence of the made investment charges on financial result of the enterprise); an estimation of influence of investment charges on financial stability (allows to lead the analysis of influence of the made investment charges on parameters of financial stability of the enterprise). The new method of on operative analysis was tested according at the Agricultural Production Cooperative 'Progress-Vertelyshki' materials.
